skins.shipDescription: York-class heavy cruiser - Exeter, Hull Number 68!
skins.selfIntroduction: Exeter, York-class heavy cruiser number two, reporting in! I took part in chasing down Admiral Graf Spee. No matter how numerous the opposition, I shall never back down when fighting for the honour of the Royal Navy!
skins.acquisition: Exeter, York-class heavy cruiser number two, reporting in! In the name of the Royal Navy, I swear that I shall contribute to your cause, Commander!
skins.login: As a royal elite, I shall not disappoint you, Commander!
skins.details: I'm counting on you for the inspection, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I can feel the honour of being in the Royal Navy no matter where I am!
skins.secretaryIdle2: York is talking nonsense yet again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My skirt gets wet all the time... Should I change into something a bit more suitable for battle?
skins.secretaryTouch: Even though I'm a member of the royal family... you still treat me as an equal, Commander. I'm touched.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...!! T-this kind of... please, don't... As a member of the royal family... if someone saw us like this...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, what do you think? I look more mature than I did before... right?
skins.acquisition: Commander, what do you think? I look more mature than I did before... right?
skins.login: As a royal elite... Ah, um... Welcome back, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even though I said I had become more mature, there are things that can't be changed overnight...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My clothes won't hang down into the water now, but don't you think this is a bit too revealing...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! Commander... P-please pay attention to the time and place...
